brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety of Qianjin Capsule of Gynaecology combined with antibiotics for pelvic inflammatory diseases (Damp-heat Stasis and Qi Deficiency Syndrome) for the short-term and long-term efficacy of traditional Chinese medicine in reducing the use of antibiotics, reducing the risk of clinical use of drugs.
